events.message: Applicant submitted a personal loan application to cover medical expenses following a recent surgery.
Loan application categorised under personal loan segment due to stated use for medical bills and ongoing treatment costs.
Loan officer Sarah Morgan assigned to the case to assist the applicant with the personal loan process and documentation.
Initial review of application performed; applicant meets preliminary credit score requirements and submitted all basic information.
Requested additional supporting documents such as recent medical bills and proof of income to verify applicant eligibility.
Applicant submitted all requested medical invoices, employment letters, and bank statements within the timeline given.
Completed credit check showing steady payment history but some outstanding debts from prior minor personal loans.
Risk assessment conducted considering medical debt, income stability, and credit history which resulted in medium risk rating.
Loan offer presented to applicant with competitive interest rate and flexible repayment terms suitable for medical loan.
Applicant provided positive feedback on the offer and requested a detailed repayment schedule to be sent for review.
Application escalated to senior loan officer to finalize terms and handle minor inconsistencies in submitted documents.
Loan successfully approved after final review, meeting all compliance and underwriting criteria for personal medical loan.
Funds disbursed to applicantâ€™s specified bank account to cover immediate medical expenses as per loan agreement.
Follow-up call conducted to confirm receipt of funds and to offer financial counseling on managing medical loan repayments.
Case closed after successful funding and follow-up; applicant satisfied with loan process and support received.
